mapper.select: SELECT w.WISH_NO, w.WISH_CREATED_AT, w.WISH_UPDATED_AT, w.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_NICKNAME, w.ALBUM_NO, a.ALBUM_TITLE, a.ARTIST_NAME, a.COVER_IMAGE_URL, a.RELEASE_DATE, a.RELEASE_PRICE, a.AVG_RATING FROM WISH_ITEMS w LEFT JOIN USERS u ON w.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN ALBUMS a ON w.ALBUM_NO = a.ALBUM_NO WHERE w.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY w.WISH_CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT WISH_NO, WISH_CREATED_AT, WISH_UPDATED_AT, USER_NO, ALBUM_NO FROM WISH_ITEMS WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND ALBUM_NO = #{albumNo}

SELECT w.WISH_NO, w.WISH_CREATED_AT, w.WISH_UPDATED_AT, w.USER_NO, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_NICKNAME, w.ALBUM_NO, a.ALBUM_TITLE, a.ARTIST_NAME, a.COVER_IMAGE_URL, a.RELEASE_DATE, a.RELEASE_PRICE, a.AVG_RATING FROM WISH_ITEMS w LEFT JOIN USERS u ON w.USER_NO = u.USER_NO LEFT JOIN ALBUMS a ON w.ALBUM_NO = a.ALBUM_NO WHERE w.USER_NO = #{userNo}
ORDER BY w.WISH_CREATED_AT DESC
ORDER BY NVL(a.AVG_RATING, 0) DESC, NVL(a.REVIEW_COUNT, 0) DESC
ORDER BY NVL(a.RELEASE_PRICE, 0) DESC
ORDER BY NVL(a.RELEASE_PRICE, 0) ASC
ORDER BY w.WISH_CREATED_AT DESC
